EmailTemplate.name: LA VetTogether 6/18
EmailTemplate.subject: LA VetTogether tomorrow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
In the mood for some good food and good company?
We’re having a VetTogether. Come meet other veterans from the LA area. Grab some food with other veterans and IAVA’s founder and CEO Paul Rieckoff.
We’ll be at El Compadre in downtown LA this Thursday, June 19th at 7:30 PM!
Click here to RSVP and more details: http://iava.org/join-iava-city-angels-vettogether
Hope to see you in LA tomorrow.
Best,
Jason -- Jason Hansman Senior Program Manager - Health Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA) 292 Madison Avenue New York, NY 10017 212.982.9699
